overview: An ideal relationship between a modern father and a timid daughter is shattered, as she introduces her romantic partner to her Malayali parents. Her father struggles with the dilemma of accepting his daughter’s decision or upholding the traditional cultural values. When the stress and anxiety of the revelation gets to be too much, Dad decides to get Alia married off, while Mum comes up with a solution to resolve Dad’s problems and bring the family together!
title: A-typical Pennukanal Story
